TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OleDbType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定要在 中使用之欄位、屬性的資料型別。

span.span: Specifies the data type of a field, a property, for use in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上表顯示之間的對應資料類型、 OLE DB 資料類型 （顯示在括號中） 和.NET Framework 型別。The preceding table shows mappings between data types, OLE DB data types (shown in parentheses), and the .NET Framework types. 資料類型接受`System.Char[]`為`Parameter.Value`參數化查詢中。The data types accept `System.Char[]` as `Parameter.Value` in parameterized queries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType BigInt = int32(20)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Binary = int32(128)

summary.span: 這會對應至型別 的 。

span.span: This maps to an of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Boolean = int32(11)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType BSTR = int32(8)

summary.span: Unicode 字元的 Null 終端字元字串 (DBTYPE_BSTR)。

span.span: A null-terminated character string of Unicode characters (DBTYPE_BSTR).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Char = int32(129)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Currency = int32(6)

span.span: A currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of a currency unit (DBTYPE_CY).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Date = int32(7)

summary.span: 日期資料，以雙精度浮點數儲存 (DBTYPE_DATE)。

span.span: Date data, stored as a double (DBTYPE_DATE).

summary.span: 整數部分為自 1899 年 12 月 30 日起的天數，而分數部分則為一天的分數部分。

span.span: The whole portion is the number of days since December 30, 1899, and the fractional portion is a fraction of a day.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBDate = int32(133)

summary.span: 使用 *yyyymmdd* (DBTYPE_DBDATE) 格式的日期資料。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBTime = int32(134)

summary.span: 使用 *hhmmss* (DBTYPE_DBTIME) 格式的時間資料。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType DBTimeStamp = int32(135)

summary.span: 使用 *yyyymmddhhmmss* (DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP) 格式的日期與時間資料。

span.span: Data and time data in the format *yyyymmddhhmmss* (DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Decimal = int32(14)

summary.span: 固定精確度和小數點位數數值，介於 -10 38 -1 和 10 38 -1 之間 (DBTYPE_DECIMAL)。

span.span: A fixed precision and scale numeric value between -10 38 -1 and 10 38 -1 (DBTYPE_DECIMAL).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Double = int32(5)

summary.span: 浮點數，在 -1.79E +308 到 1.79E +308 範圍中 (DBTYPE_R8)。

span.span: A floating-point number within the range of -1.79E +308 through 1.79E +308 (DBTYPE_R8).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Empty = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Error = int32(10)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Filetime = int32(64)

summary.span: 64 位元不帶正負號的整數，表示自 1601 年 1 月 1 日起 100 奈秒的間隔數 (DBTYPE_FILETIME)。

span.span: A 64-bit unsigned integer representing the number of 100-nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (DBTYPE_FILETIME).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Guid = int32(72)

summary.span: 全域唯一識別項 (或 GUID) (DBTYPE_GUID)。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType IDispatch = int32(9)

remarks.format: ## Remarks ADO.NET 目前不支援這種資料類型。This data type is not currently supported by ADO.NET. 使用方式可能會造成無法預期的結果。Usage may cause unpredictable results.

.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType IUnknown = int32(13)

span.span: An exact numeric value with a fixed precision and scale (DBTYPE_NUMERIC).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType Variant = int32(12)

summary.span: 特殊的資料型別，可以包含數值、字串、二進位或日期資料，以及 Empty 和 Null 等特殊值 (DBTYPE_VARIANT)。

span.span: A special data type that can contain numeric, string, binary, or date data, and also the special values Empty and Null (DBTYPE_VARIANT).

summary.span: 如果未指定其他型別，則會假設為這個型別。

span.span: This type is assumed if no other is specified.
